summary.para: The CERT_POLICY_INFO structure contains an object identifier (OID) specifying a policy and an optional array of policy qualifiers.
The CERT_POLICY_INFO structure is a component of.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_INFO.pszPolicyIdentifier
member.summary: Object identifier (OID) string specifying the policy.

member.name: CERT_POLICY_INFO.cPolicyQualifier
member.summary: Number of elements in the rgPolicyQualifier array.
